name: Jino's Endless Trial
description:
Gam2002 Project - Jino's Endless Trial

This is my University project for my Games Design module (Gam2002).

The File is an APK for android Devices. 

To install the game Developer Mode needs to be activated.

How to play the game:  Imagine a vertical line in the middle of the screen,  any taps made on the right side of the screen will result in a jump, while in jump a second jump is available that will reset the momentum of the fist, the left side of the screen is in charge of sliding (crouching), tap this side of the screen to minimise the size of the player to enter narrow gaps, while in air tapping this side of the ground will result in a quick fall. Tapping the player (the blue box around the player) will result in the player Dashing (small teleport forward), this ability has a brief cool down and can be used mid air or while grounded. Meaning you can use this ability in combinations with the jump and crouch (This will be required to complete later levels).
